channel.title: What language would you advise?
channel.description:
I have quite a large collection of e-books, and I want to organize them. First I tried to spread them over various folders, but I didn't like that 'system' as it lacks quite a few features. So I came up with the following:
A program that lists all e-books, and allows you to sort all e-books by genre. Apply a genre to a book. Allows you to print a list of all books, or sorted by genre, on paper or in HTML format. Search for a book. Open a book by clicking on the title, with a e-book reader (like Foxit Reader). etc..
Basically, a program you can find at your local library.
But what is the best language for this? It doesn't have to bee low level, because all it has to do is load a .txt with info and save it back to that file. My idea was Delphi, as it's easy to program and even easier to design a GUI with. But what do you think?
